actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance to the city of Redmond, Oreg., of the reversionary interest of the United States in certain lands.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation of convey a reversionary interest in specified patent lands to Redmond, Oregon.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance to the city of Redmond, Oreg., of the reversionary interest of the United States in certain lands.
